requirements.summary: Update answer-generation UI copy to emphasize full solutions and render multi-paragraph backend output cleanly without breaking the echoed-riddle safeguard.
acceptanceCriteria: The 'Generate Answer' output area correctly displays multi-line text (including blank lines) returned by the backend without truncation.
Any user-facing descriptions in the answer-generation UI that imply 'analyze riddle text' should be updated to explicitly say it generates a 'full solution' (English text).
The existing frontend safeguard that detects an echoed riddle remains compatible (i.e., should not falsely trigger for valid full-solution responses).

file_operations.description: Update the shadcn/ui Card copy (title/description/labels) to explicitly describe generating a full solution (final answer + explanation) rather than restating/analyzing the riddle. Replace the current read-only Textarea output with a read-only display that preserves whitespace (including blank lines) using a non-input element (e.g., a container with whitespace-preserving styling) and supports long multi-paragraph text without truncation (allow full height and/or scrolling). Keep the echoed-riddle safeguard logic but harden it to also treat empty/whitespace-only backend responses as invalid while ensuring it only flags exact trimmed matches (to avoid false positives for valid solutions). Use existing shadcn/ui components already imported/composed; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Adjust user-facing copy around riddle entry to align with the new 'full solution' framing (e.g., replace 'analyze' phrasing in the riddle text helper and hero subtitle with 'generate a full solution' / 'solve with explanation'). Keep existing layout and composition; do not change restricted hook files or shadcn/ui internals. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
